pullRequest.title: Move Cassandra Product Tests to launcher

nodes.bodyText:
Move Cassandra Product Tests to launcher

This is the commit pattern i used. Not very important, but since this is a part of a series, we may choose to be consistent:
Convert cassandra environment to Launcher

(my commits didn't have "environment", but it seems we better add it, especially in this case)
I'd add this at the end. (you placed this in between hadoop-based environments)
